components.name: TabComponent
TabsComponent
components.templateData:
<!-- <mat-toolbar class="example-header">Header</mat-toolbar> -->

<mat-sidenav-container class="example-container">
  <mat-sidenav
    #sidenav
    mode="side"
    opened
    class="example-sidenav"
    [fixedInViewport]="false"
    [fixedTopGap]="0"
    [fixedBottomGap]="0"
  >
    <tab
      svgIconName="sdk_assignment"
      label="הקצאות סדכ"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 0"
      (click)="scrollTo(0)"
    ></tab>
    <tab
      svgIconName="reserve"
      label="שריונים"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 1"
      (click)="scrollTo(1)"
    ></tab>
    <tab
      svgIconName="areas"
      label="אזורים ומבנים"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 2"
      (click)="scrollTo(2)"
    ></tab>
    <tab
      svgIconName="assignments"
      label="הקצאות"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 3"
      (click)="scrollTo(3)"
    ></tab>
    <tab
      svgIconName="remarks"
      label="הערות"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 4"
      (click)="scrollTo(4)"
    ></tab>
    <tab
      svgIconName="advanced_instructions"
      label="הנחיות מתקדמות"
      [isActive]="selectedSectionId === 5"
      (click)="scrollTo(5)"
    ></tab>
  </mat-sidenav>
  <mat-sidenav-content #appScrollEvent>
    <ng-container *ngFor="let index_tab of [0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]">
      <ng-container
        *ngTemplateOutlet="content; context: { index_tab }"
      ></ng-container
    ></ng-container>
  </mat-sidenav-content>
</mat-sidenav-container>

<ng-template #content let-index_tab="index_tab">
  <section #section [id]="index_tab">
    content{{ index_tab }} content{{ index_tab }} content{{
      index_tab
    }}

      index_tab
    }}

hh{{ tabs[0] }}
<ng-container
  *ngIf="tabs[0] && tabs[0].template"
  [ngTemplateOutlet]="tabs[0].template"
></ng-container>
<!--<ng-template #content5>{{ templateBinding(2) }}</ng-template> -->

components.name: TabsMockComponent
components.template:
<app-tabs *ngIf="initialTabs" [tabs]="tabs"></app-tabs>
   <ng-template #content0>{{ templateBinding(0) }}</ng-template>
   <ng-template #content1>{{ templateBinding(1) }}</ng-template>
   <ng-template #content2>{{ templateBinding(2) }}</ng-template>
   <ng-template #content3>{{ templateBinding(3) }}</ng-template>
   <ng-template #content4>{{ templateBinding(4) }}</ng-template>
   <ng-template #content5>{{ templateBinding(5) }}</ng-template>
